com.canoo.platform.server.spi

Interface ConfigurationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicConfigurationProvider, ConfigurationProviderAdapter, SimpleConfigurationProvider

    @API(since="0.x",
     status=EXPERIMENTAL)
public interface ConfigurationProvider
    A provider for configuration properties. This can be used to define the default values for all the properties of a module.
    Author:
    Hendrik Ebbers
    See Also:
    PlatformConfiguration

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> getBooleanProperties()
      Returns a map of property value pairs.

      Returns a map of property value pairs.

      Returns a map of property value pairs.
